name: auth1b
description: + AuthN: who you are     + sth you know: password     + sth you have: physical devices     + sth you are: biometrics     + some authentication methods:          + password-based         + multi-factor authN (MFA)         + single-sign on (SSO)         + magic link/passwordless + AuthZ: what you have access to     + usually done after successfull authentication     + info is transmitted through an Access Token (Authorization credential, in the form of an opaque string or JWT, used to access an API)     + Role-based access control (RBAC)
